description: React custom hook 'useCategories' used to fetch expense or income categories from an API, with fallback mock data for development or testing.

methods.name: useCategories({ type, user_id, include_defaults } = {})
methods.description: A React hook that fetches categories data from an API endpoint based on provided options, handles loading state, errors, and provides fallback mock data when API is mocked.

ctags.name: useCategories
ctags.pattern: /^export default function useCategories({ type, user_id, include_defaults } = {}) {$/
